title: Possum's tale
viewing_guidelines: Aboriginal and Islander viewers should note this work may contain images of deceased people and caution should be exercised when viewing.
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Memory
Aboriginal Australia/Aboriginal Australians - Social life and customs
abstract: My country is in my heart everywhere I go
description: "My country is in my heart everywhere I go. My country is in my blood no matter what happens to me. My country is my family and my community..." This is a poetic documentary exploring the spiritual connection between Aboriginal people and the country they were born in. It recreates the childhood experience of the director, Josie Atkinson, as she attempts to return home to her country as a young child.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B1006779; First Hand: five films; Active; 2005
